Title: Mentum
Content: The mentum is an anatomical structure a projecting feature that is near the mouth of a variety of animals In insects the mentum is the distal part of the labium The mentum bears the palps glossae paraglossae andor ligula On the human face the mentum refers to the protruding part of the chin In certain sea snails marine gastropod mollusks the mentum is a thin projection of the soft parts of the animal below the mouth It is found in the family Pyramidellidae
